main_definition: To advance in rank or position, typically due to increased performance or achievement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Advance professionally within a company or organization.
meanings_and_examples.example: After consistently delivering excellent sales results, John was promoted to regional manager.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Increase in status or rank, usually related to accomplishments or recognition.
meanings_and_examples.example: Sarah's hard work earned her a promotion from junior analyst to senior analyst.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To give more importance or attention to something. In the context of media or entertainment.
meanings_and_examples.example: The network decided to promote this new TV show by scheduling it at prime time slots for a month.
